GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.29 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
scsi: fcoe: Fix Wstringop-overflow warnings in fcoe_wwn_from_mac()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit ffd3bed66b54d78c5140d8a19a83c7647208a882, it was introduced in version v2.6.29 by commit 85b4aa4926a50210b683ac89326e338e7d131211. For more details please see the references link.
